artist: Artist: Stefano Zattera; Publisher: Delirio House, Cornedo Vicentino, Ita.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, full bleed, photomechanical image of figure having his brain picked (recto) by a monster (verso), printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 12 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Cronache dal Cranio
